page.title: 12RECREATION IN MARSHFIELD
page.content: During the Summer there is a cricket team who have their own field and social club on the edge of the village. A very successful moto-cross club also perform during the warmer months. In the Winter two football teams play on Saturday afternoons and Sunday mornings, each having a pitch on the recreation ground. Badminton is played in the Church Hall on Tuesday evenings while the local Inns have teams competing in darts, cribbage and pool leagues. An annual event occurring every September is a six mile "fun run" in which many villagers compete, some seriously and some, as the name says, "just for fun". Many contestants are sponsored for charities. Some horses are kept for hacking, show jumping and eventing. The countryside is ideal for walking and bird watching.
